name: eggd_generate_workbook
title: eggd_generate_workbook
summary: Create Excel workbook from VEP annotated vcf

inputSpec.name: exclude_columns
inputSpec.label: Exclude columns
inputSpec.help: Columns of VCF to exclude from output xlsx

inputSpec.name: include_columns
inputSpec.label: Include columns
inputSpec.help: Columns of VCF to only include in output xlsx

inputSpec.name: reorder_columns
inputSpec.label: Reorder columns
inputSpec.help: Set order for columns in workbook, any not specified will be appended to the end

inputSpec.name: rename_columns
inputSpec.label: Rename columns
inputSpec.help: = separated key value pairs of VCF fields to rename in output xlsx

inputSpec.name: types
inputSpec.label: Types
inputSpec.help: = separated key value pairs of field=type to overwrite in VCF header (i.e CSQ_gnomADg_AF=Float)

inputSpec.name: keep_filtered
inputSpec.label: Keep filtered
inputSpec.help: Determines if to keep filtered variants in separate 'excluded' tab

inputSpec.name: keep_tmp
inputSpec.label: Keep tmp vcfs
inputSpec.help: Determines if to upload the intermediate bcftools split and filtered vcfs

inputSpec.name: add_samplename_column
inputSpec.label: Add sample name
inputSpec.help: Determines if to add samplename as first column in each sheet

inputSpec.name: sheet_names
inputSpec.label: Sheet names
inputSpec.help: 'Names to use for workbook sheets, these MUST be the same number as the number of vcfs passed and in the same order. If not given, and if there is 1 vcf passed the sheet will be named `variants`, else if multiple vcfs are passed the name prefix of the vcf will be used

inputSpec.name: output_prefix
inputSpec.label: Output prefix
inputSpec.help: Prefix for naming output xlsx file

inputSpec.name: merge_vcfs
inputSpec.label: Merge
inputSpec.help: Determines if to merge multiple VCFs to one sheet

inputSpec.name: summary
inputSpec.label: Summary
inputSpec.help: If to include summary sheet, specify key of assay

inputSpec.name: acmg
inputSpec.label: ACMG
inputSpec.help: Determines if to add extra sheet with ACMG reporting criteria

inputSpec.name: print_columns
inputSpec.label: Print columns
inputSpec.help: Print all column names of all vcfs that will be output to the xlsx. Useful to identify what will be in the output to include/exclude.

inputSpec.name: print_header
inputSpec.label: Print header
inputSpec.help: Print header of first vcf that will be output to the xlsx. Useful to identify field types in the VCF, which can be modified with --types.

inputSpec.name: panel
inputSpec.label: String of panel information to display in summary sheet

inputSpec.name: clinical_indication
inputSpec.label: String of clinical indication to display in summary sheet

outputSpec.name: xlsx_report
outputSpec.label: Excel workbook for the given vcf(s)

outputSpec.name: tmp_vcfs
outputSpec.label: tmp vcfs
outputSpec.help: intermediate split and annotated vcfs, output with --keep_tmp
